title: DevOps and stability improvements
description:
Description
The different versions of the POT service (v1/v2/v3) are constantly maintained. All identified bugs are solved and deployed to production until end of the PI. The existing features are improved and smaller changes are implemented and deployed to production.
acceptance_criteria: Bugs are fixed in all POT versions
All bugs are fixed at the end of the PI
Improvements for existing features are implemented
